title: Cashing in on war: Why stealing Russia’s assets actually makes things worse for the EU
description: The EU’s plot to use Russian funds to finance Kiev is going to backfire on all parties involved in the illegal seizure Read Full Article at RT.com
content: After a week of humiliation in which her much-touted plot to sequester Russian assets to fund Kiev’s war chest was outright rejected by both Belgium and the European Central Bank, European Commission… [+10043 chars]
